actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Department of Energy Organization Act to establish a limitation of time for issuing remedial orders under that Act and commencing certain enforcement actions under other energy laws.

summary.text: Amends the Department of Energy Organization Act to establish a time limit for the issuance of remedial orders under such Act and under other specified Acts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Department of Energy Organization Act to establish a limitation of time for issuing remedial orders under that Act and commencing certain enforcement actions under other energy laws.
